ef463d94-c33b-4b15-8c39-11f2c7986771.description: Earners understand and have practiced the fundamentals of a Lean startup framework and design thinking to validate an innovative business idea. Through an iterative process supported by engaging online learning, optimized expert mentorship, and accessible tools, all graduates have de-risked, validated and pitched an early stage startup idea.
ef463d94-c33b-4b15-8c39-11f2c7986771.name: Empowered Startups - Global Startup Accelerator Entrepreneur

badge_template_activities.title: 16+ hours of interactive online learning focused on Lean Startup and Horizon Methodology, and Design Thinking. All Learning is focused on achieving Problem Solution fit for early stage startup and includes iterative business and traction modeling, Entrepreneurial mind shifts, Customer discovery/interviews, Minimum Viable product development, and pitch building.
40+ hours validating an innovative business model by customer and market discovery, as well as building a prototype design/schematic or wireframe, and finally a pitch document.

skills.name: Approach Business Modelling With A Strategic Mindset

b31a0707-61c2-455e-ad8d-0163b59fbfda.description: Earners are Founders of their own innovative global Startup. During this journey they have learned and actioned an advanced level of lean startup methodology, design thinking/ product development, and sales & marketing. By going through an iterative process of testing and learning from customers before using insights to develop a minimum viable product, earners are generating traction for their startup and delivering value to users and customers.
b31a0707-61c2-455e-ad8d-0163b59fbfda.name: Empowered Startups - Startup Incubator Founder

badge_template_activities.title: 100+ hours of interactive online learning combined with advanced Startup mentorship focused on lean startup, sales, marketing, product development, and startup scaling. All learning is focused on achieving problem/solution fit before going on to achieve product/market fit. This includes startup management, digital marketing, and minimum viable product development.

Launch a Startup into the global market and spend 24 months validating an innovative business model by generating traction and building a minimum viable product that creates value for users and customers.

fc7e3d4d-52f9-4efd-9b70-a026f17aed05.description: The earner has applied Lean Startup methods to validate an innovative business model and performed key tasks to support business launch. The learning, doing and entire journey has been rooted in Indigenous ways of knowing, being and doing. Through a process of reflection, discovery and iteration, customer feedback and focused mentorship, the earner has de-risked and validated an early-stage venture.
fc7e3d4d-52f9-4efd-9b70-a026f17aed05.name: Empowered Nations - Indigenous Entrepreneurship Founder

badge_template_activities.title: 64+ hours of learning on an interactive online platform plus 10+ hours of one-on-one mentorship. Focus was on achieving Problem-Solution fit and introducing a Minimum Viable Product and pricing to potential customers. Curriculum also delivered holistic and relevant life-long skills including communication, mental health, planning & design, and guidance specific to Indigenous entrepreneurs on financing, Intellectual Property, protocol and impact.

40+ hours of planning and actioning steps towards opening a business: This includes validating a business model, building a prototype or demo, identifying and communicating with customers and early adopters, business registration, branding & marketing, bookkeeping, and financing strategy. Documented customer feedback, business and traction models, Intellectual Property analysis, Pitch Deck presentation and Venture Report are all deliverables.

skills.name: Entrepreneurship Through Indigenous Ways Of Knowing

c3f995e5-5167-4728-b986-989379c5d8b3.description: The earner has demonstrated critical mind shifts key to entrepreneurship including resilience, determination, creativity, and willingness to iterate thoughts based on learning. As part of the YES journey they built an innovative business model and tested it through customer and market discovery. The learner practiced critical skills that allow them to resonate and be highly valuable to the transforming global workforce and their community, and seek-out and excel at future learning opportunity.
c3f995e5-5167-4728-b986-989379c5d8b3.name: Young Empowered Startuppers - Entrepreneur

badge_template_activities.title: 16+ hours of engaging and interactive online learning focused on Lean Startup Methodology and Design Thinking. All Learning is focused on achieving Problem Solution fit for early stage startup and includes iterative business and traction modeling, Entrepreneurial mind shifts, Customer discovery/interviews, Minimum Viable product development, and pitch building.
40+ hours validating an innovative business model by customer and market discovery, as well as building a prototype design/schematic or wireframe, and finally a pitch document.

69614c14-216c-4522-ba76-6ed2e0e5862f.description: Earners have demonstrated their ability to mentor founders through an entrepreneurship journey supported by the robust Empowered Startups EdTech platform that trains founders on a Lean startup framework and provides digital tools to best support the launch of a validated startup idea.
69614c14-216c-4522-ba76-6ed2e0e5862f.name: Empowered Startups - Startup Ecosystem Mentor

badge_template_activities.title: As an Empowered Startups' Ecosystem mentor you must have successfully completed at least one of the Empowered Startups' entrepreneurship programs delivered through their robust EdTech platform, and have successfully supported a minimum of 5 founders through an entrepreneurial journey within the platform. All mentors also receive ongoing training sessions from expert Startup Leaders within the Empowered Startups network.
